description: Rich brownies meet sweet ice cream in one indulgent bar.
keywords: Häagen-Dazs Vanilla Ice Cream Brownie Bars
name: HäagenDazs Vanilla Ice Cream Brownie Bars Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 115 g Lindt Dark No Sugar Added
3 tsp Queen Natural Vanilla Concentrated Extract

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a plastic bag with fudge. Cut a small hole in one of the bag corners. Pipe out stripes of fudge, diagonally across the brownie.
